page.title: 02A TYPICAL CHILD'S DAY
page.content: A typical day for an Upper Junior pupil started from before 7 and up to 8 o'clock-the majority rising between 7.30 & 8.00. T.V., pet care, helping in the home & leisure pursuits preceded breakfast which for the majority consisted of cereals & toast.The most popular beverage was tea. 68% of the class travel to school by car, 28% walk & 4% cycle. Most arrive in time for a pre-school chat but 12% arrive at 9.00. The general timetable is Morning Registration, Assembly & basic '3R' work. Afternoons include needlework, science, art, topic work & games.80% of the children bring a packed lunch, 20% having a hot meal brought from Coleshill Middle School. School finishes at 3.15pm.
